TopicTitle: ISA resets after I restart the game

Articles.Content: It's not that serious but it gets kinda annoying.

I'm guessing you're using v3.3.4 -- I had the same problem after KSP 0.20 was released. You have two solutions to choose from:

Download the experimental v4.0 from the author's blog.

Hack your filesystem to allow the old version to find its maps.
Aye, thanks, ill download the experimental thing
